H0.text: how many hoops are used in a game of croquet. 4

H1.text: how many hoops are used in a game of croquet. 8

H2.text: how many hoops are used in a game of croquet. 9

H3.text: how many hoops are used in a game of croquet. six

A4.text: The object of the game is to be the first to strike each of one's balls through all six hoops in both directions

A5.text: In American six-wicket, the object of the game is to be the first to strike each of one's balls through all six hoops in both directions
